skills.name: GRAND THEFT
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Lower ATK of the enemy for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to Steal Golden Shield and Block Effects from the target and grant them to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: REGRESS
desc: • Inflict Bloodlust and Bleed on the enemy for the duration of battle.
• Grant an Extra Turn to self and a target ally.

skills.name: SUSPECT
desc: Gain 2 random Golden Effects at the start of battle. Gain Damage Charge for 2 turns if Trap is present at the start of your turn.
